mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, GENDER, EMAIL, BIRTH, ROLE, AGE) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name},#{phone},#{gender},#{email},#{birth},#{role}, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,#{birth})/12))
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PW=#{pw}, EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, PHONE=#{phone} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
